content.value:
Frailejon Hostel is located in the Candelaria, centro historic the best neighbourhood in Bogota.

Our property is on second floors, the first floor we have the reception and a living room, a patio of relaxation with hammock and sofas, there is three rooms, private single, private double and triple. On the second floor we have a bathroom with showers, three dormitories. all with comfortable beds and with natural lighting and ventilation, quiet and very private.

Set in Bogot√° and with Quevedo's Jet reachable within 500 metres, Frailejon Hostel offers express check-in and check-out, non-smoking rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi throughout the property and a garden. The property is located 6 km from El Campin Stadium, 7 km from Corferias International Exhibition Center and 11 km from T Zone. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, a shared kitchen and organising tours for guests.

description.description: Frailejon Hostel is a hostel that combines art, bright colours, comfort and a relaxed atmosphere. we are a family place,quiet with excellent lighting, full of art, friendly and helpful staff located in the best place in Bogota near the historical centre surrounded by museums,universities, bars, restaurants and 15 minutes from the hill of Montserrat.
